verses.name: Ezekiel 44:13
verses.text: And they shall not come near unto me, to do the office of a priest unto me, nor to come near to any of my holy things, in the most holy place: but they shall bear their shame, and their abominations which they have committed.

verses.name: Ezekiel 44:14
verses.text: But I will make them keepers of the charge of the house, for all the service thereof, and for all that shall be done therein.
